snippet.title: (OLD TRAILER) BE MY HORDE | Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
We announce our newest game - BE MY HORDE.

WISHLIST ON STEAM: 
👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2499520/Be_My_Horde/

Create your horde! Play as Moriana, a powerful necromancer, and raise massive armies of the dead. Slay your enemies, resurrect them, and use them to conquer the fantasy world. With souls of the fallen, you can upgrade your phylactery and return stronger after each demise. Death is just the beginning...

FIND OUT MORE
💀 https://discord.com/invite/wsmQ432DVC 
💀 https://twitter.com/polishedgames
💀 https://www.instagram.com/polishedgames/

#indiegame #trailer #gametrailers
